about_the_game:
Slash, growl and roar your enemies into submission with these three feline-themed skins. Designed to make your armoury purr before you sink your bullet-shaped teeth into your foes.

Features:
  • Lavish Leopard (weapon skin)
  • Combat Cheetah (weapon skin)
  • White Tiger (weapon skin)

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
